<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 27, 2015 - 19:52 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This will stop AI disembarking when immobile
<code>KK_fnc_allowCrewInImmobile <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> {
	_this [[allowCrewInImmobile]] true;
	{
		_x [[disableAI]] "FSM";
		_x [[setBehaviour]] "CARELESS";
	} [[forEach]] [[crew]] _this;
};
//example
car [[call]] KK_fnc_allowCrewInImmobile;</code>
</dd>
</dl>
